name: nutrient supply from single superphosphate | inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23548/documentation

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''single superphosphate'' for fertiliser use. ;No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use. The purpose of this activity is to connect the chemical production of ''single superphosphate'' with its generic use as fertilizer. The product ''single superphosphate'' is connected to the generic market for ''inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5'' through this supplying activity. In the agricultural context, ''single superphosphate'' can be used directly as a fertilizer input to crop production, eventually with other chemicals; alternatively, a generic input of ''inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5'' can be used instead, and this will represent the regional consumption mix for his type of nutrient. A way in between is allowed by using the generic input ''inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5'' and link to the activity providing it from a specific chemical.; In all cases, emissions associated to the application of the fertilizer have to be calculated in the crop production activity.

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''single superphosphate'' for fertiliser use.

No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use.
